title: 我的世界VoxelSniper下载了怎么装？
author: 活得很活的人
txt_content: 前段时间下载了VoxelSniper（简称VS），结果不会装。百度也没有发现与安装VoxelSniper有关的页面。求解如何安装。

replies.author: Roger543449
replies.txt_content:
到bukkit.org上下载最新的craftbukkit.jar文件. 为其建文件夹 . 然后重命名craftbukkit.jar为craftbukkit.jar. 新建一个txt文件并输入以下内容:
java -Xmx1024M -jar craftbukkit.jar -o false PAUSE.
保存文档后将其改为 "run.bat". 双击"run.bat". 等待一会儿会出现一些文件. 将下好的VoxelSniper 放到"plugins" 文件夹目录下 . 返回“Run.bat” 窗囗中，输入"reload" 后回车. 
大功告成！你现在可以加入本机IP的服务器并使用 VoxelSniper了.

Go to bukkit.org, download the latest craftbukkit.jar. Put it in a folder named "My Server" or whatever. In that folder, rename the craftbukkit.jar (It will have a bunch of numbers etc) to craftbukkit.jar. Create a text file and copy/paste this:

java -Xmx1024M -jar craftbukkit.jar -o false PAUSE.

Save the file in the folder with the name "run.bat". With the extension .bat. Go to your folder and double click "run.bat". Wait a while and alot of files will be in your folder. Go to "plugins" and place the VoxelSniper file downloaded from wherever in there. Go to the run.bat black console thing and type in "reload" and hit enter. There you go, now you can join the server with the ip "localhost".
